name: Build for Level Cap 20 Server (Cleric Pref)
author: xxdeadstarxx

posts.author: xxdeadstarxx
posts.content:
Hey guys, I'm on a server where the max level is twenty. Looking for a powerful build for PvE and the occasional PvP confrontation. Would prefer something with level nine cleric spells, as I tend to always play clerics, but I'm open to listening to others as well.

Classes are pretty much NWN default, magical items up to +3, with possible +4.

If people need more info to give better suggestions, let me know. =D

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: At first glance, I'd suggest you to go for Cleric 19 Monk 1 zen archer / caster. The Monk level can be taken at 17 for a Tumble dump. Is that in line with what you want?

posts.author: xxdeadstarxx
posts.content: I'm slightly concerned about the damage that would do in comparison to something melee based because of the Darkfire buff. Do you know of any melee builds where I can rock full plate/tower shield and do well?

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: For that I'd say pure Cleric, Cleric 18 or 19 / Fighter 1 or 2, or Cleric 18 / Fighter 1 / Bard 1. Or, how about a Cleric 18 or 19 / Monk 1 or 2 casting Darkfire on his kama(s)?
